text: Ezɨ Israelian atrivim akɨnafarir kamɨn ganigha uan navir osɨmtɨzim akakagha uan korotiam abɨki. Egha a kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Amei! Sirian atrivim tizim bagha kamaghɨn na bagh akam amada, kɨ mangɨ gumazir kamɨn arɨmariam akɨrigham? A ti ghaze, kɨ God, kɨ gumazim damightɨ a deragh ikiamin gavgavim iti, a? O kɨ gumazim damightɨ, an aremeghamin gavgavim iti, a? Kɨ fo, a na mɨsoghasa tuaviba buri.”
